title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 202.2 - Hospitals with special facilities certified
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 202.2 - Hospitals with special facilities certified

State Regulations

The following hospitals have been certified by the
commissioner as having such special facilities: Buffalo State Hospital, Buffalo, New York

Central Islip State Hospital, Central Islip, New York

Manhattan State Hospital, New York, New York

Middletown State Hospital, Middletown, New York

Pilgrim State Hospital, West Brentwood, New York

Utica State Hospital, Utica, New York. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 14

202.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
